entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 12:57 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog dissipating before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
